name: Shmup'em all
description:
Shmup'em all is a twin stick shooter that was made during the Ludum Dare 43 in 48h.

The theme was "Sacrifices must be made" so we chose do make a game were you loose abilities instead of winning some. We all hope you will enjoy it <3

Must be played with a controller !

Controls : Powers : LB, RB, LT, RT

                 Moving : Left Stick

                 Aiming : Right Stick

Art : GFLOX

Sound : Auzingueur
Devs : Nomisgor & Nyrh
